aircraft.value: Sparrow Light - AC-1800-389 at Forward Operating Base-1

defect_observed.value: Intermittent power loss during flight operations. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Manufacturing defect in material composition leading to premature failure

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Generator Control component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock

preventive_action.value: Enhance operator training on proper usage procedures

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 23/11/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 24/11/2023 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 28/11/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 27/11/2023 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 03/12/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel
